item.title: pydoc3 builtins
item.description: A short screencast showing how to use the command `pydoc3` to access the Python documentation in the terminal on a Linux based operating system.

item.title: Read a Description of the Linux Filesystem Hierarchy

item.title: It Works In My Container Funny Black Desgin for Developers
item.description: IT teams who practice DevOps often use containers in their workflow. In such an environment "It works in my container" is a programmer excuse you may here more often than its popular predecessor "It works on my machine". A design for software developers

item.title: debugger; - JavaScript/Web Developer Black Text Design
item.description: Computer programmers and software developers who write JavaScript code use the "debugger;" statement to add a breakpoint to stop program execution at the point, where it occurs in the code. Show your love for web development & JS with this simple design.

item.title: I ? Unicode Funny Software Engineer Design Black Text
item.description: Computer programmers and software engineers know that encoding is hard. There's ASCII, Unicode and a plethora of other standards. If the encoding is unknown and wrongly detected you may end up with weird characters or question marks as on this fun design.
